languages.text: Обзор страшного корабля зоркими очами авгуров указал, что судно серьезно повреждено и находится в процессе разрушения. Времени, чтобы исследовать его, оставалось совсем немного. Наименее поврежденными выглядели три сектора — мостик, средняя палуба экипажа и техотсек.

traits.locale_text: Обзор страшного корабля зоркими очами авгуров указал на три сектора, выглядящих наименее поврежденными и доступными для исследования. Это были мостик, средняя палуба экипажа и техотсек.

languages.text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.
languages.original_text: Обзор страшного корабля зоркими очами авгуров указал, что судно серьезно повреждено и находится в процессе разрушения. Времени, чтобы исследовать его, оставалось совсем немного. Наименее поврежденными выглядели три сектора — мостик, средняя палуба экипажа и техотсек.

traits.locale_text: The augers' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying three sectors that seemed the least damaged and therefore the most suitable for exploration: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

The augers' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying three sectors that seemed the least damaged and therefore the most suitable for exploration: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

The augers' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying three sectors that seemed the least damaged and therefore the most suitable for exploration: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

languages.text: Los penetrantes ojos de los augures analizaron la siniestra nave, identificando que la nave del vacío estaba atravesando su último proceso de erosión. Quedaba poco tiempo para explorarla. Había tres sectores menos dañados que el resto: el puente, la cubierta central de la tripulación y la bahía de servicio.
languages.original_text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

traits.locale_text: Los penetrantes ojos de los augures analizaron la siniestra nave, identificando que la nave del vacío estaba atravesando su último proceso de erosión. Quedaba poco tiempo para explorarla. Había tres sectores menos dañados que el resto: el puente, la cubierta central de la tripulación y la bahía de servicio.

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵彻底扫描了一遍这艘阴森、恐怖的飞船，确定这艘虚空舰已经遭到了严重的破坏，目前进入了最后的腐蚀阶段，能够用来探索飞船的时间已经不多了。飞船上损坏程度最低的三个区域分别是舰桥、中层船员甲板，以及维修区域。
languages.original_text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

traits.locale_text: 俄歇矩阵彻底扫描了一遍这艘阴森、恐怖的飞船，确定这艘虚空舰已经遭到了严重的破坏，目前进入了最后的腐蚀阶段，能够用来探索飞船的时间已经不多了。飞船上损坏程度最低的三个区域分别是舰桥、中层船员甲板，以及维修区域。

languages.text: スキャナーの鋭い目が不気味な船をスキャンし、ヴォイドシップがひどい傷を負っていること、そして侵食の最終局面にあることを確認した。船内を探索する時間はほとんどない。ブリッジ、中央クルーデッキ、サービスベイの3つのセクターが最も被害が少ないようだ。
languages.original_text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーの鋭い目が不気味な船をスキャンし、ヴォイドシップがひどい傷を負っていること、そして侵食の最終局面にあることを確認した。船内を探索する時間はほとんどない。ブリッジ、中央クルーデッキ、サービスベイの3つのセクターが最も被害が少ないようだ。

languages.text: Die scharfen Augen der Auguren scannten das unheimliche Schiff und fanden heraus, dass es schwer beschädigt war und kurz vor der endgültigen Auflösung stand. Die Zeit für eine Erkundung war knapp bemessen. Drei Sektoren waren am wenigsten beschädigt: die Brücke, das mittlere Crewdeck und die Wartungsbucht.
languages.original_text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

traits.locale_text: Die scharfen Augen der Auguren scannten das unheimliche Schiff und fanden heraus, dass es schwer beschädigt war und kurz vor der endgültigen Auflösung stand. Die Zeit für eine Erkundung war knapp bemessen. Drei Sektoren waren am wenigsten beschädigt: die Brücke, das mittlere Crewdeck und die Wartungsbucht.

languages.text: Après avoir examiné le sinistre vaisseau de leurs yeux perçants, les scrutateurs déterminèrent qu'il avait subi d'importants dégâts et était actuellement en phase d'érosion finale. L'exploration allait devoir être brève. Trois secteurs semblaient moins endommagés que le reste : la passerelle, le pont intermédiaire et l'aire de service.
languages.original_text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir examiné le sinistre vaisseau de leurs yeux perçants, les scrutateurs déterminèrent qu'il avait subi d'importants dégâts et était actuellement en phase d'érosion finale. L'exploration allait devoir être brève. Trois secteurs semblaient moins endommagés que le reste : la passerelle, le pont intermédiaire et l'aire de service.

languages.text: Alametler, şahin gözleriyle ürpertici aracı taradı. Uçsuz gemisinin ağır hasar aldığı ve nihai yok oluş yolunda ilerlediği kanaatine varıldı. Bu yüzden keşfetmek için çok zamanları yoktu. Üç sektör, diğerlerinden daha az hasar almıştı... Bu bölümler; köprü, orta güverte ve hizmet bölmesiydi.
languages.original_text: The augurs' keen eyes scanned the eerie vessel, identifying that the voidship was gravely damaged and was in the process of final erosion. There was very little time to explore it. Three sectors seemed the least damaged: the bridge, the middle crew deck, and the service bay.

traits.locale_text: Alametler, şahin gözleriyle ürpertici aracı taradı. Uçsuz gemisinin ağır hasar aldığı ve nihai yok oluş yolunda ilerlediği kanaatine varıldı. Bu yüzden keşfetmek için süre kısıtlıydı. Üç sektör, diğerlerinden daha az hasar almıştı… Bu bölümler köprü, orta güverte ve hizmet bölmesiydi.
